Name: Login with valid credentials
Steps: 1. Navigate to login page|2. Enter valid username|3. Enter valid password|4. Click Sign In button|5. Verify successful login

Name: Login with invalid username
Steps: 1. Open login page|2. Enter invalid username|3. Enter any password|4. Click login button|5. Verify error message

Name: Password reset functionality
Steps: 1. Navigate to login page|2. Click Forgot Password|3. Enter email address|4. Click Send Reset Link|5. Check email and follow reset process

Name: User profile update
Steps: 1. Login to application|2. Navigate to profile page|3. Click Edit Profile|4. Update information|5. Save changes

Name: Create new project
Steps: 1. Navigate to projects dashboard|2. Click Create New Project|3. Enter project details|4. Set permissions|5. Create project

Name: Add team member
Steps: 1. Open project|2. Navigate to team section|3. Click Add Member|4. Enter member details|5. Send invitation

Name: Create test case
Steps: 1. Navigate to test repository|2. Click Create Test Case|3. Enter test details|4. Add test steps|5. Save test case

Name: Execute test case
Steps: 1. Open test run|2. Select test case|3. Execute test steps|4. Record results|5. Submit execution

Name: Generate test report
Steps: 1. Navigate to reporting|2. Select report type|3. Configure parameters|4. Generate report|5. Export results

Name: API authentication test
Steps: 1. Setup API environment|2. Configure auth headers|3. Send test requests|4. Verify responses|5. Document results

Name: Database connectivity test
Steps: 1. Configure connection|2. Test connection|3. Execute queries|4. Monitor performance|5. Generate report

Name: File upload validation
Steps: 1. Navigate to upload interface|2. Select test files|3. Verify validation|4. Test different formats|5. Confirm upload success

Name: Search functionality test
Steps: 1. Access search interface|2. Enter search terms|3. Review results|4. Test filters|5. Verify performance

Name: Performance load testing
Steps: 1. Configure load environment|2. Set up user scenarios|3. Execute load test|4. Monitor metrics|5. Generate performance report

Name: Security vulnerability scan
Steps: 1. Configure security scanner|2. Set target URLs|3. Start scan|4. Review findings|5. Generate security report

Name: Cross-browser compatibility
Steps: 1. Test on Chrome|2. Test on Firefox|3. Test on Safari|4. Test on Edge|5. Document compatibility issues

Name: Mobile responsiveness test
Steps: 1. Open on mobile device|2. Test portrait mode|3. Test landscape mode|4. Verify touch interactions|5. Check responsiveness

Name: Backup and restore test
Steps: 1. Configure backup|2. Initiate backup process|3. Simulate data loss|4. Restore from backup|5. Verify data integrity

Name: User session timeout
Steps: 1. Login to application|2. Remain inactive|3. Wait for timeout|4. Attempt action|5. Verify automatic logout

Name: Two-factor authentication
Steps: 1. Access security settings|2. Enable 2FA|3. Set up authenticator|4. Test login with 2FA|5. Verify backup codes
